channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- CODESYS Development System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- CODESYS Development System

item.title: CVE-2023-3670|2024-10-21T17:43:52.386Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system
item.description: In CODESYS Development System 3.5.9.0 to 3.5.17.0 and CODESYS Scripting 4.0.0.0 to 4.1.0.0 unsafe directory permissions would allow an attacker with local access to the workstation to place potentially harmful and disguised scripts that could be executed by legitimate users.
